an5.63:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, vaddhihi vaddhamano ariyasavako ariyaya vaddhiya vaddhati, saradayi ca hoti varadayi ca kayassa.
an5.63:1.3: Saddhaya vaddhati, silena vaddhati, sutena vaddhati, cagena vaddhati, pannaya vaddhati—
an5.63:1.4: imahi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi vaddhihi vaddhamano ariyasavako ariyaya vaddhiya vaddhati, saradayi ca hoti varadayi ca kayassa”ti.
